metadata.title: Zuperfresh Produce Saver 16 Packets, Extend the Life of Your Fruits & Vegetables, Absorbs Ethylene Gas Which Cause Produce to Over Ripen & Spoil
features: FRESHNESS UP TO 3x LONGER: Extend produce freshness at home and enjoy fresher, better tasting and more nutritious fruits and vegetables. Plus eliminates odors.

EFFECTIVELY ABSORBS ETHYLENE GAS: Zuperfresh absorbs ethylene gases emitted by produce that signal them to ripen. Eliminating this gas slows the ripening process, greatly extending shelf life and slows spoilage.
FOOD SAFE & SAVES MONEY: Save hundreds in wasted produce by extending freshness at home and enjoy fresher, better tasting and more nutritious fruits and vegetables.
SIMPLE TO USE: Place Zuperfresh a packet directly into produce packaging.
INCLUDES: 16 packets. Reuse packets for up to 30 days.
description: Zuperfresh absorbs ethylene gas which cause produce to over ripen & spoil, plus reduces odors. Enjoy fresher produce for up to 3x longer! Ethylene gas is a natural plant hormone fruits and vegetables emit. It signals them to accelerate the ripening process, eventually causing deterioration. Lowering the level of ethylene gas surrounding produce with Zuperfresh greatly extends shelf life and slows spoilage. Major farmers utilize ethylene gas absorption technologies to maintain produce freshness from farm to market. Now you too can extend that freshness at home and enjoy fresher, better tasting and more nutritious fruits and vegetables. Just place a packet directly into produce packaging, they’re food safe and non toxic. Reuse packets for up to 30 days.
